noun.description: The way in which something, especially an organization or equipment, is organized, planned, or arranged.
examples: would you feel comfortable in a team-teaching set-up?

noun.description: A scheme or trick intended to incriminate or deceive someone.
examples: Listen. He didn't die. It was a set-up

noun.description: (in a ball game) a pass or play intended to provide an opportunity for another player to score.
